column1: Baby Barnaby's////that's all i can say. i mean
column3: my potatoes & sausage were also delicious. yes
column4: my friends' french toast and bagel were wonderful & toasted to perfection. yes
column6: our waitress was rad & helpful & not around too too much but we always had full coffee cups & water glasses. yes
column7: the atmosphere is good & the joint is bright and perfect for a sunday afternoon. but gracious sakes alive
